Sentencas: Apatite-type silicates are considered as promising electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Single step reactive sintering and chemical compatibility between La9Sr1Si6O26.5 and selected cathode materials

Sentencas: However more studies on the chemical compatibility of these materials with common SOFC electrodes are required.
Titulo: Single step reactive sintering and chemical compatibility between La9Sr1Si6O26.5 and selected cathode materials

Sentencas: Here, we report the synthesis of single phase La9Sr1Si6O26.5 composition by reactive sintering at 1650 degrees C for 10 h. Fully dense pellets showed very high oxide-anion conductivity, 25 mS cm(-1) at 700 degrees
Titulo: Single step reactive sintering and chemical compatibility between La9Sr1Si6O26.5 and selected cathode materials

Sentencas: C. Furthermore, the chemical compatibility of La9Sr1Si6O26.5 with some selected cathode materials has also been investigated.
Titulo: Single step reactive sintering and chemical compatibility between La9Sr1Si6O26.5 and selected cathode materials

Sentencas: The lowest reaction temperatures were determined to be 1100 degrees C, 1000 degrees C and 900 degrees C for La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-delta, La2Ni0.8Cu0.2O4 and La0.6Sr0.4Co0.8Fe0.2O3, respectively.
Titulo: Single step reactive sintering and chemical compatibility between La9Sr1Si6O26.5 and selected cathode materials

Sentencas: The segregation of minor amounts of SiO2 seems to be a key limiting factor that must be overcome.
Titulo: Single step reactive sintering and chemical compatibility between La9Sr1Si6O26.5 and selected cathode materials

Sentencas: Finally, these cathode materials were deposited over dense oxy-apatite pellets and the area specific resistances in symmetrical cells were determined.
Titulo: Single step reactive sintering and chemical compatibility between La9Sr1Si6O26.5 and selected cathode materials

Sentencas: These values, at 700 degrees C, were 14.4 and 2.6 Omega cm(2) for La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-delta and La0.6Sr0.4Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta, respectively.
Titulo: Single step reactive sintering and chemical compatibility between La9Sr1Si6O26.5 and selected cathode materials

Sentencas: Furthermore, the area specific resistances are notably improved 0.6 Omega cm(2) when a 50 wt.% composite of La0.6Sr0.4Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta and Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 is used.
Titulo: Single step reactive sintering and chemical compatibility between La9Sr1Si6O26.5 and selected cathode materials
